name: Shopping Expenses Tracker
description: A shopping expenses tracker is a tool for individuals to monitor and manage their personal or household spending on various items and goods.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?PDFOutput helps automate PDF generation for documents using Notion Database and a Google Doc!No Coding Required, No Technical Skills Needed, Just One-Click Automation!It requires 2 things: Google Doc Template: A templat
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; View all your Shopping Related Expenses in one glance.; Add all the different categories for shopping expenses such asClothing or Personal Expenses, Food or Supplies Expenses, or Home or Maintenancerelated expenses.; CalculateTotal Expense Amount,Set Budgeted Expense Amountand% of Budgeted Expense Paid.; Get a complete summary of all expenses incurred under one glance.
